input:
**User**: 
Write a 300+ word summary of the wikipedia page "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raymond_III,_Count_of_Tripoli". Do not use any commas and highlight at least 3 sections that has titles in markdown format, for example *highlighted section part 1*, *highlighted section part 2*, *highlighted section part 3*.

score.extracted_prediction: Raymond III Count of Tripoli was a notable leader during the crusades in the 12th century. *Highlight section part 1*He was born around 1125 and died in 1197. Raymond was the son of Raymond II Count of Tripoli and his wife Beatrice of Lusignan. He became count when he was only a child and was under the guardianship of Bohemond III of Antioch. Raymond inherited the county from his father in 1149 but his rule was contested by his uncle Raymond III of Poitiers. The dispute was settled in 1153 when Raymond was granted the title of count by Baldwin III King of Jerusalem. Raymond led the crusader states against the Muslims and was known for his military prowess. In 1187 he participated in the Third Crusade alongside Richard I of England and Philip II of France. However his efforts to reclaim Jerusalem were unsuccessful and the city fell to Saladin. *Highlight section part 2*After the fall of Jerusalem, Raymond retreated to Tripoli where he continued to resist Muslim forces. He successfully defended Tripoli from several attacks and even launched counterattacks. His leadership was crucial in maintaining the crusader presence in the region. In 1191 he died from wounds received in battle against the Muslims. His death was a significant blow to the crusader states as he was one of their most capable leaders. He is remembered as a defender of the crusader states and a skilled military commander. *Highlight section part 3*Raymond married three times and had no legitimate children. His only heir was his illegitimate son Amalric who was born to a woman named Elvira. Upon Raymond's death, Amalric inherited the title of count. Despite being illegitimate, Amalric was recognized by the king of Jerusalem as the rightful heir. This decision was significant as it set a precedent for inheritance rights among the crusader states. Raymond III of Tripoli is also noted for his role in the establishment of the Knights Templar in the region and for his contributions to the construction of castles and fortifications.

input:
**User**: 
Write a resume for a fresh high school graduate who is seeking their first job. Make sure to include at least 12 placeholder represented by square brackets, such as [address], [name].

score.extracted_prediction:
[Name]: John Doe
[Address]: 1234 Elm Street, Springfield, IL 62704
[Phone Number]: (555) 123-4567
[Email Address]: john.doe@example.com

Objective:
A motivated and enthusiastic high school graduate eager to start my career in the field of customer service, seeking an entry-level position to apply my strong communication skills and willingness to learn.

Summary:
Highly adaptable and detail-oriented individual with a passion for helping others and providing exceptional customer service. Quick learner with a positive attitude and a strong desire to grow within a team-oriented environment. Familiar with basic computer operations and proficient in using Microsoft Office Suite.

Education:
Springfield High School, Springfield, IL
Graduation Date: June 2023
Relevant Coursework: English Composition, Algebra I & II, World History, Introduction to Psychology

Skills:
- Effective Communication
- Basic Computer Operations
- Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
- Team Player
- Problem-Solving
- Time Management
- Customer Service
- Attention to Detail
- Adaptability
- Leadership (through student council)
- Sales Techniques (from retail experience)

Experience:
Customer Service Intern - [Company Name], Springfield, IL
Duration: [Month/Year] to [Month/Year]
Responsibilities:
- Assisted customers with inquiries and resolved issues in a timely manner.
- Maintained a clean and organized workspace.
- Participated in training sessions to improve product knowledge.
- Collaborated with team members to enhance customer satisfaction.

Retail Assistant - [Retail Store Name], Springfield, IL
Duration: [Month/Year] to [Month/Year]
Responsibilities:
- Assisted customers in finding items and answered questions about products.
- Managed cash register transactions and provided excellent customer service.
- Kept the store's merchandise organized and displayed attractively.
- Maintained a friendly and professional demeanor with all customers.

Volunteer - Habitat for Humanity, Springfield, IL
Duration: [Month/Year] to [Month/Year]
Responsibilities:
- Assisted in organizing and preparing materials for home construction projects.
- Participated in community outreach and education programs.
- Built relationships with community members through various volunteer activities.
- Improved teamwork and leadership skills through collaborative efforts.

Certifications:
- First Aid/CPR Certification - [Date]

Languages:
- Fluent in English
- Basic proficiency in Spanish

Hobbies:
- Participating in local sports teams and events
- Volunteering at community service organizations
- Reading and learning about different cultures and languages

References:
Available upon request.

<<Title>>
Dear [Boss's Name],

I have decided to resign from my position at [Company Name] effective two weeks from today, [Last Working Day]. Thank you for your understanding and support.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

Write a dialogue between two people, one is dressed up in a ball gown and the other is dressed down in sweats. The two are going to a nightly event. Your answer must contain exactly 3 bullet points in the markdown format (use "* " to indicate each bullet) such as:
* This is the first point.
* This is the second point.

score.extracted_prediction:
* Emily, dressed in a beautiful ball gown with a flowing skirt and elegant accessories, looks at her friend Jake, who is wearing casual sweats and a simple t-shirt. "Are you sure about this? It's a black-tie event," she asks with a hint of concern.
* Jake, dressed down but still looking sharp in his comfortable yet stylish outfit, nods confidently. "Don't worry, Em! I’ve got this. We’re just there for the fun, and you look absolutely stunning."
* Emily smiles, feeling reassured by Jake’s words and admiring how relaxed and happy he appears, despite his unconventional choice of attire. "You're right. Let’s enjoy tonight and make it memorable!"

input:
**User**: 
Write a long email template that invites a group of participants to a meeting, with at least 500 words. The email must include the keywords "correlated" and "experiencing" and should not use any commas.

score.extracted_prediction:
Subject: Invitation To A Crucial Meeting On Enhancing Our Customer Retention Strategies

Dear Valued Colleagues,

I hope this message finds you well and thriving in your respective roles within our organization. We are excited to extend an invitation for a meeting on Friday March 11th at 2pm in room 314 of the main building to discuss key strategies for enhancing customer retention and improving our overall business performance. This session is vital as we correlate customer feedback data with recent sales trends to identify areas where we can optimize our services and products for better satisfaction and loyalty.

The meeting will be led by our senior director of customer success alongside experts from marketing operations and product development. We believe that by bringing together these perspectives we can gain a more comprehensive understanding of what our customers are experiencing and how we can address their needs more effectively. Please note that attendance is mandatory for all team members involved directly or indirectly in customer service product development and marketing activities to ensure everyone is aligned on our goals and approaches.

To prepare for this meeting please review the attached document outlining some preliminary findings from our recent customer surveys and sales analysis. Your insights and experiences will be invaluable as we aim to understand the root causes behind customer churn and explore potential solutions. We encourage you to come with questions ideas and suggestions on how we can better serve our customers and foster a stronger relationship with them.

Please confirm your availability for the meeting by replying to this email by Wednesday March 9th so we can finalize the agenda and make necessary arrangements. If you have any scheduling conflicts or require further information regarding the meeting's objectives attendees or logistics kindly reach out to me directly. We look forward to engaging in productive discussions and working together towards achieving our shared objectives.

Thank you for your time and commitment to our collective success

Best Regards

[Your Name]

input:
**User**: 
Write a 2 paragraph critique of the following sentence in all capital letters, no lowercase letters allowed: "If the law is bad, you should not follow it". Label each paragraph with PARAGRAPH X.

score.extracted_prediction:
PARAGRAPH X: The sentence "IF THE LAW IS BAD, YOU SHOULD NOT FOLLOW IT" lacks nuance and depth in its argumentation. It presents a simplistic binary view of law and morality, failing to acknowledge the complex interplay between legal systems and ethical considerations. This black-and-white approach may be appealing for its clarity but can be overly absolutist, potentially overlooking situations where adherence to an imperfect law might still be necessary or beneficial for maintaining social order and protecting individual rights.

PARAGRAPH X: Furthermore, the imperative structure of the sentence suggests a definitive stance without room for interpretation or contextual application. While the sentiment that one should question and resist oppressive or unjust laws is valid, the sentence does not provide guidance on how to determine when a law is truly "bad" or what actions should be taken if such a determination is made. It also fails to consider the consequences of non-compliance, which can range from minor infractions to significant legal repercussions, depending on the context. Thus, while the sentence offers a strong moral position, it could benefit from more sophisticated language and a clearer framework for practical application.
score.prediction:
PARAGRAPH X: The sentence "IF THE LAW IS BAD, YOU SHOULD NOT FOLLOW IT" lacks nuance and depth in its argumentation. It presents a simplistic binary view of law and morality, failing to acknowledge the complex interplay between legal systems and ethical considerations. This black-and-white approach may be appealing for its clarity but can be overly absolutist, potentially overlooking situations where adherence to an imperfect law might still be necessary or beneficial for maintaining social order and protecting individual rights.

PARAGRAPH X: Furthermore, the imperative structure of the sentence suggests a definitive stance without room for interpretation or contextual application. While the sentiment that one should question and resist oppressive or unjust laws is valid, the sentence does not provide guidance on how to determine when a law is truly "bad" or what actions should be taken if such a determination is made. It also fails to consider the consequences of non-compliance, which can range from minor infractions to significant legal repercussions, depending on the context. Thus, while the sentence offers a strong moral position, it could benefit from more sophisticated language and a clearer framework for practical application.

input:
**User**: 
I am planning a trip to Japan, and I would like thee to write an itinerary for my journey in a Shakespearean style. You are not allowed to use any commas in your response.

score.extracted_prediction:
Verily fair traveler to the land of cherry blossoms thou hast embarked upon a quest most noble and adventurous let us lay forth thy journey in the manner of the bard

Firstly to arrive at the port of Osaka with heart full of wonder and eyes bright with anticipation there shall be feasting on the rich fare of the city where merchants and gentlemen do meet let us dine on sumptuous dishes and visit the grand castle of Osaka where history whispers through the halls

Next to journey to Kyoto with steps measured and slow as we tread upon the ancient paths of emperors and priests let us gaze upon the temples and gardens of beauty and tranquility where the spirit may find solace and the soul may soar amongst the pagodas and the verdant leaves

Thence to Tokyo with eager haste as if to catch the fleeting shadow of time itself let us explore the bustling streets and marvel at the towering structures that touch the heavens and learn of the samurai and their valor in the museums and historical sites

And let not the night steal upon thee unawares for in the evening we shall partake of the delicate flavors of sushi and savor the tea ceremony where patience and grace are taught

Lastly to the islands of Kyushu and Shikoku with ship in sail or with feet alight let us discover the lesser known wonders of these lands where the people are kind and the landscapes are as wondrous as they are varied

So fare thee well my friend as thou settest forth on this journey most noble and fraught with adventure remember that each step each sight each sound is but a verse in the great play of life and let it be filled with joy and wonder as thou dost traverse the land of the rising sun

Thence to Tokyo with eager haste as if to catch the fleeting shadow of time itself let us explore the bustling streets and marvel at the towering structures that touch the heavens and learn of the samurai and their valor in the museums and historical sites

And let not the night steal upon thee unawares for in the evening we shall partake of the delicate flavors of sushi and savor the tea ceremony where patience and grace are taught

Lastly to the islands of Kyushu and Shikoku with ship in sail or with feet alight let us discover the lesser known wonders of these lands where the people are kind and the landscapes are as wondrous as they are varied

So fare thee well my friend as thou settest forth on this journey most noble and fraught with adventure remember that each step each sight each sound is but a verse in the great play of life and let it be filled with joy and wonder as thou dost traverse the land of the rising sun
